Title: Beyond Pre-training: Scaling Cloud-Native LLMs with Contextual Data for Real-Time AI
Abstract: Static LLMs are outdated the moment they're trained. Want AI that’s real-time, relevant, and enterprise-ready? Learn how RAG, CDPs, and cloud-native architectures unlock hyper-personalized AI, boost engagement by 3x, and solve data fragmentation at scale.

Title: Transforming Insurance Through AI: Advanced Applications, Data-Driven Insights, and Technical Challenges
Abstract: Discover how AI is revolutionizing insurance! From 85% faster claims to 99.5% fraud detection accuracy, we’ll unveil cutting-edge strategies transforming underwriting, claims, and customer experience. Learn practical solutions to challenges and drive growth with AI-powered innovation.

Title: Harnessing Cloud-Native AI for Real-Time Surveillance of Antibiotic Resistance: Insights from a Phase 3 UTI Treatment Trial
Abstract: Antibiotic resistance is a ticking time bomb what if AI and cloud-native tech could predict and combat it in real time Discover how cutting-edge analytics transformed a Phase 3 UTI trial, exposing resistance trends and redefining drug efficacy. Don't miss this game-changing fusion of AI and medicine

Title: Cloud-Native AI in Entertainment: Revolutionizing the Music Industry with Data Science
Abstract: This talk highlights how cloud-native AI and data science are transforming the music industry, empowering personalized experiences, real-time content creation, and data-driven audience engagement.

Title: AI and Machine Learning Transformations in Financial Institutions
Abstract: Explore how AI/ML applications are transforming banking, with practical examples from fraud detection to personalized customer experiences

Title: Building Scalable Data and AI Solutions with Cloud-Native Architecture
Abstract: Introduction to Cloud-Native: Explain what cloud-native means and how it differs from traditional architectures. Benefits for Data and AI: Discuss how cloud-native technologies enable flexibility, scalability, and automation for data processing, machine learning models, and AI workflows.

Title: AI-Powered Root Cause Analysis: Transforming Problem-Solving with Data-Driven Insights
Abstract: Discover how AI-powered Root Cause Analysis slashes downtime costs by 50%, detects system faults with 99% accuracy, and predicts failures before they happen. Don't miss this game-changing talk on AI's role in next-gen automation and business resilience

Title: Salesforce Platform & AI Agentforce as a CloudNative App
Abstract: The Salesforce platform AI is indeed a cloud-native application, leveraging cloud-native technologies to build and deploy its services. #Cloud-Native Principles in SF Containerization and Microservices Kubernetes for Orchestration Multi-Cloud Support Metadata-Driven Design Scalability & Performance

Title: Machine Learning Meets Kubernetes: Orchestrating AI at Scale
Abstract: Unlock the future of AI with Kubernetes, In this talk, we'll reveal how to supercharge your machine learning workflows, scale models effortlessly, and deploy cutting-edge AI. Whether you're driving innovation or conquering data challenges, discover how Kubernetes takes ML to the next level
Picture: Prashanth Lakshmi Narayana Chaitanya Josyula & Anant Kumar_cloud.png

Title: Reference Architecture of AI in the Cloud
Abstract: Discover the core principles and best practices of deploying AI solutions in the cloud. Learn how to leverage cloud services for efficient, scalable, and robust AI implementations. We dive into reference architecture, covering AI dimensions like pipelines, model training, deployment.

Title: From Monolith to Microservices: A Data-Driven Journey of AI Integration and Performance Gains
Abstract: Discover how enterprises leverage AI-powered microservices for real-time anomaly detection, predictive maintenance, and cost savings. Gain battle-tested strategies to boost dev velocity, slash incident response times, and shape the future of cloud-native. A must-attend for architects!

Title: Optimizing Telecommunications Infrastructure with AI: Performance, Efficiency, and Future Readiness
Abstract: Discover how AI is transforming telecom infrastructure! From 90% accurate traffic prediction to 50% faster deployments and 25% energy savings, this talk unveils groundbreaking performance and efficiency gains with real-world data and case studies. Future-proof your networks with AI!

Title: Revolutionizing Donor Management: AI-Driven Predictive Analytics for Maximized Fundraising Impact
Abstract: Unlock the power of AI to supercharge fundraising! Discover how predictive analytics and real-time AI-driven insights can boost donor retention by 40%, increase conversions by 30%, and maximize campaign ROI by 25%. Join us to transform donor engagement and drive data-powered fundraising success!

Title: Optimizing Solar Energy Efficiency with Predictive Analytics and AI: The Future of Smart Solar Farms
Abstract: Unlock the future of solar energy with AI and predictive analytics! Discover how cutting-edge IoT and machine learning reduce costs, boost efficiency, and maximize energy production, transforming solar farms into smart, sustainable powerhouses.

Title: Bringing Container-Native Simplicity to AI/ML
Abstract: The deployment of AI projects often faces significant hurdles due to the fragmented nature of their components—datasets, models, and model weights are frequently stored in separate repositories. We will explore the critical challenges posed by this and how to overcome them with the help of modelkits

JobTitle1: SAP S/4 HANA, Cloud, Architect & SAP Lead Engineer
Title: Transforming Enterprises with SAP S/4HANA Cloud, SAP BTP, and SAP AI: Strategies for Scalable Innovation
Abstract: Unlock the future of enterprise innovation! Discover how SAP S/4HANA Cloud, SAP BTP, and SAP AI drive 40% efficiency gains with real-time analytics, AI-powered insights, and scalable architectures. Learn actionable strategies to transform operations, reduce costs, and outpace the competition!

Title: Cloud-Native AI for Fraud Prevention: Real-Time Risk Scoring with Machine Learning and Bayesian Networks
Abstract: Discover how cloud-native AI, real-time ML, and Bayesian networks slash fraud losses, boost accuracy to 95.2%, and cut false positives by 47%! Join us to explore scalable, AI-driven fraud prevention that keeps transactions fast & secure

Title: AI-Powered Clinical Trials: Transforming Statistical Programming for Speed, Compliance, and Precision
Abstract: AI is revolutionizing clinical trials—cutting timelines by 45%, improving safety predictions by 83%, and automating compliance with 94% accuracy. Learn how AI/ML accelerates insights, streamlines execution, and transforms statistical programming in the cloud.

Title: DevOps Meets AI: Automating Cloud-Native Infrastructure with Intelligent Tools
Abstract: Discover how AI is transforming DevOps by automating cloud-native infrastructure, enabling smarter workflows, and unlocking the potential for resilient, scalable, and self-healing systems.

Title: Bridging AI Promises and Business Reality: A Practical Guide to Enterprise AI Implementation
Abstract: I will share insights into building scalable AI solutions that deliver measurable business value. I'll demonstrate how we transformed theoretical AI concepts into practical applications while navigating common pitfalls in enterprise environments.

Title: Cloud-Native AI in Procurement: Automating Sourcing, Reducing Costs, and Enhancing Supply Chain Resilience
Abstract: Discover how cloud-native AI slashes costs, automates sourcing, and predicts disruptions with 85% accuracy. From $3.8M savings to 60% faster contracts, see how AI transforms supply chains into strategic, risk-proof powerhouses.

Title: From Manual to Magical: How Rule-Based AI is Transforming Dental Insurance Claims
Abstract: Discover how rule-based AI is transforming dental insurance from a paperwork nightmare into a seamless digital experience. Learn how leading insurers cut processing time by 60%, slash costs by 30%, and boost accuracy to 90%+ using intelligent automation. Real case studies, practical insights.

Title: Navigating the World of API Gateways: A Comparative Analysis of Open Source Solutions
Abstract: This talk offers a comparative analysis of top open-source API gateways—like Kong, Traefik, and Envoy—helping you choose the right solution for scalable and secure API management in cloud-native environments.

Title: Your API needs to operate on the worldwide edge
Abstract: When you deploy your API on the edge, you’re no more than 50ms from almost all the internet-connected folks in the world. It’s like running a brick-and-mortar business and having a store in 100+ cities worldwide, where you’re globally present but retain the local personalized approach to selling.

Title: Netrunner's Guide to AWS SES: Hacking Communication Barriers
Abstract: 500,000+ emails daily. Real media tech insights. Communication that doesn't just send—it delivers. Reliably, with visibility and when you need it the most. By the person who powers and advocated AWS for the whole media giant of Austria.

JobTitle1: Senior Solutions Architect, Global Financial Services
Title: Life of a packet in Amazon EKS
Abstract: Ever wonder how packets navigate the Amazon EKS maze? Join me for a wild ride from internet to pod, demystifying Route53, ALB, and VPC magic along the way. No more being stuck between teams during outages – become the go-to troubleshooter. It's like 'The Magic School Bus' for cloud networking!

Title: Optimizing Multi-Cloud Database Architectures for Scalability and Reliability
Abstract: Discover how to design scalable, cost-effective multi-cloud database architectures while ensuring high availability, leveraging Kaarthiik Thota's proven expertise and practical insights.

Title: Ultra-Budget AWS: Running Scalable Apps for Pennies
Abstract: Want to run a backend on AWS without breaking the bank? Learn how to build a scalable, production-ready architecture using mechanisms like AWS Lambda + Lambda Powertools, a self-hosted PostgreSQL on a cheap EC2 instance, React on S3 + CloudFront, or DynamoDB—keeping performance high and costs low.

Title: Streamline your Cloud Native Application Deployment using AWS SAM
Abstract: When applications grow big and distributed, having control over the app-code and infrastructure is challenging; especially with tightly coupled app code in Cloud native services (Example: AWS Lambda). In this session, learn to optimize deploying and running Cloud native applications, using AWS SAM.

Title: Essential Engineering
Abstract: Learn how high-performing teams build better software faster by leveraging essential architecture patterns and efficient team processes. This talk provides practical techniques for developing reliable, scalable systems quickly to meet critical business goals in today's fast-paced environment.

Title: Radical Therapy for Software Teams
Abstract: Revamp team communication with radical transparency. Create a culture of openness, honesty, and positivity for a more empowering work environment. Learn how to implement radical transparency in your DevOps, software, and product development processes.

Title: Monitoring Production Grade Agentic Rag Pipelines
Abstract: It's time to say bye-bye to naive/vanilla RAG systems where we could easily plug in our sample clean data to query using LLM. Several parameters are needed to upgrade from PoC to production, where performance is a key factor in achieving enhanced results.

Title: Cloud-Native Analytics: Transforming Big Data into Real-Time Product Insights
Abstract: See how transforming big data into real-time actionable insights becomes possible with cloud-native technologies driving smarter products and scale business success.

Title: Breaking Data Silos: How Lakehouse Architectures Are Transforming Exabyte-Scale Enterprise Data Management
Abstract: Struggling with data chaos? Learn how data lakehouse architectures unify data lakes & warehouses for better management. Explore Apache Iceberg, Delta Lake & Spark to cut costs, eliminate silos & enable real-time analytics. Future-proof your data—don’t miss this talk!

Title: Enhancing Business Resilience with Azure Site Recovery: A Data-Driven Approach to Cloud-Based Disaster Recovery
Abstract: Downtime costs millions! Azure Site Recovery (ASR) cuts recovery time by 87.5%, disaster recovery costs by 60%, and ensures 99.9% data retention. Leverage AI-driven orchestration for fast, scalable, and cost-effective business continuity. Future-proof your operations today!

Title: Cloud-Native Data Integration: Architecting Scalable, Secure, and AI-Driven Solutions
Abstract: Discover how top enterprises crush data silos, scale seamlessly, and secure pipelines with zero-trust, AI-driven automation, and real-time streaming. Learn battle-tested strategies to cut costs, boost agility, and power 1.5M events/sec with sub-10ms latency

Title: Optimizing Product Management with Multi-Tenancy Architecture: Strategies and Insights
Abstract: Multi-tenancy is the secret to scalable, cost-efficient SaaS. But how do you balance customization, data isolation, and performance? This session unveils best practices, real-world strategies, and lessons learned from building multi-tenant architectures that maximize efficiency without complexity.

Title: Mastering Cloud Native Technologies: Enabling Scalable Data Analytics for Enterprise Success
Abstract: Unlock the power of cloud-native tech to supercharge your enterprise data analytics! Discover how IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS fuel real-time insights, boost efficiency, and integrate AI/ML for a competitive edge. Get actionable strategies for scalable success. Don’t miss out!

Title: Decetralized P2P networks
Abstract: Learn the core concepts of p2p networks, their main components and principles these networks are based on. The speech will help you to broaden your horisons and undertstand how popular p2p networks like BitTorrent and IPFS work.

Title: Why and how build your own web server in C#
Abstract: I built a web server with .NET Core, and it was an incredible learning journey! In this talk, I’ll cover why I did it, the tools I used, the challenges I faced, and how I solved them. You’ll gain insights into the process, lessons learned, and how this project can level up your skills.

Title: Coming soon
Abstract: Coming soon

Title: Have your head in the clouds while keeping your feet firmly on the ground
Abstract: Have you ever had any doubts about your applications going to the cloud? What about the remaining on-premise deployments? Edge? And what the heck is fog? Head spinning already? Good. We might just have a solution for you: a meta operating system approach to the cloud-fog-edge computing continuum.

Title: Revolutionizing Last-Mile Delivery: The Power of Cloud Computing and IoT
Abstract: Explore how cloud computing and IoT are transforming last-mile delivery by enabling real-time tracking, predictive analytics, and smart logistics.

Title: Harnessing SAP FICO for Financial Excellence: A Data-Driven Blueprint for Cloud-Native Implementation
Abstract: Discover how a cloud-native, data-driven SAP FICO implementation can transform financial processes! Learn proven strategies, real-world insights, and actionable steps to boost reporting accuracy by 30%, reduce errors, and enhance decision-making

Title: Smart Cities Unleashed: Harnessing Milvus & Ollama for Cutting-Edge RAG Solutions
Abstract: Discover how Milvus and Ollama are revolutionizing city data analytics with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). In this session, we’ll explore how these cloud-native tools transform vast urban datasets into actionable insights, enabling smarter decision-making in real time. From optimizing traffic flows to enhancing public services, learn how to harness cutting-edge AI and vector search technology to tackle the unique challenges of modern city management. Unlock the future of smart cities and elevate urban innovation to new heights!

Title: Tree Ensemble Classifiers in Cloud-Native ML: Performance & Scalability Challenges
Abstract: Tree ensemble methods (Random Forest, Gradient Boosting) are widely used in ML but can be inefficient in cloud-based, multi-threaded environments due to uneven workload distribution across heterogeneous CPU cores. This talk analyzes performance trade-offs in existing ONNX-based implementations, introduces a custom C++ wrapper for optimized task scheduling, and demonstrates a 4x speedup in cloud-based inference workloads.

Title: Revolutionizing Cloud-Native Applications with NLP: The Future of Text Analytics and AI-Driven Language Generation
Abstract: Unlock the power of NLP to revolutionize cloud-native applications! Learn how cutting-edge models like GPT-4, BERT, and advanced tokenization techniques are reshaping industries like healthcare, finance, and customer service. Discover deployment strategies, optimization tips

Title: Cloud-Native Data Engineering in Healthcare: Powering Precision Medicine and AI-Driven Diagnosis
Abstract: Harness cloud-native data engineering to transform healthcare! Discover how AI-driven analytics, real-time pipelines, and scalable architectures enable precision medicine, early disease detection, and smarter diagnostics. Explore the future of AI-powered, data-driven healthcare with us!

Title: API-Led Healthcare Transformation: Enhancing Interoperability, Diagnostics & Personalized Medicine with MuleSoft
Abstract: Unlock the Future of Healthcare with APIs!  Struggling with data silos, slow integrations, and rising costs? Discover how MuleSoft’s API-led connectivity slashes integration time by 65%, boosts diagnostic accuracy by 42%, and drives $4.2M in annual savings per facility.

Title: Cloud-Native Strategies for Secure and Scalable HIPAA-Compliant EDI in Healthcare
Abstract: Unlock the power of cloud-native EDI for secure, scalable, and HIPAA-compliant healthcare transactions! Learn how AI-driven compliance, zero-trust security, and serverless architectures cut costs by 35%, boost uptime to 99.98%, and slash processing delays. Join us to future-proof your healthcare EDI

Title: Building Cloud-Native Machine Learning Systems for Healthcare Fraud Detection: Scaling ML Operations for Enterprise-Grade FWA Prevention
Abstract: Discover how to build a scalable, cloud-native ML system that processes millions of healthcare claims in real-time. Learn battle-tested patterns for distributed training, MLOps automation, and high-performance model serving that saved healthcare

Title: Cloud Testing Without the Wait: Transforming the Kubernetes development experience
Abstract:
Imagine if you could shift left on your cloud testing and shorten the development loop from hours to seconds.
In this session,We’ll explore how remocal development can create realistic testing scenarios, enabling teams to uncover critical issues before they impact production.

Title: Optimizing Database Management in Kubernetes
Abstract: Let's explore managing databases in Kubernetes, covering key challenges like backups, scaling, HA, and horizontal scalability for both on-disk databases and in-memory stores. Learn how Kubernetes Operators and other control planes can simplify database management and enhance DevOps workflows.

Title: Introduction to SpinKube
Abstract: SpinKube streamlines developing, deploying and operating Spin WebAssembly applications in Kubernetes, resulting in delivering smaller, and more portable applications. The session will also introduce you to Spin and SpinKube, and compare and contrast the benefits and trade-off compared to containers.

Title: Optimizing Kubernetes Networking with Cilium and BGP
Abstract: K8s networking, crucial yet often overlooked, can make or break cloud deployments. Learn how Cilium and BGP integration simplifies complex networking challenges. Through beginner-friendly explanations and practical use-cases, we will discover proven techniques to build reliable cloud-native networks

Title: Low-Maintenance Backend Architectures for Scalable Applications
Abstract: Learn to build scalable, low-maintenance backends using Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms, ensuring automation, fault tolerance, and cost efficiency.

Title: Transforming Fleet Management with AI, IoT, and Kubernetes: Scalable, Smart, and Sustainable Solutions
Abstract: Discover how AI, IoT, and Kubernetes are revolutionizing fleet management! Learn how predictive analytics, real-time IoT insights, and scalable cloud-native platforms can slash costs, boost efficiency, and scale operations by 300%. Unleash smarter, greener, and safer fleets in this must-attend!

Title: Microservices at Scale: Unlocking Agility, Resilience, and Continuous Innovation
Abstract: Microservices are redefining scalability, agility, and innovation—are you keeping up? Learn how industry leaders deploy 23x faster, cut MTTR by 92%, and push updates every 11.7 seconds. This talk reveals the secrets to mastering microservices at scale. Future-proof your architecture now!

Title: 10x Scalability & 99.99% Uptime: Kubernetes for Industrial Ecosystems
Abstract: Legacy monolithic industrial systems face scalability and flexibility challenges. Migrating to Kubernetes-powered microservices enables 40% faster deployments, 99.9% uptime, 30% cost reduction and 3x better fault isolation. This talk presents case studies & insights to modernize the IIoT ecosystems.

Title: In Defense of Microservices
Abstract: Once hailed as the solution for modern applications, microservices are now criticized for complexity and operational bottlenecks. Here we will address critiques with practical solutions and showcase actual implementations. Discover why microservices still matter and how to adopt them effectively.

Title: Cloud Native Resilience: Building Scalable and Fault-Tolerant Systems
Abstract: Learn how to design cloud-native systems that are both resilient and scalable. Drawing from experience at Meta, Amazon, and PayPal, this talk explores microservices, containerization, and automation strategies to ensure fault tolerance and high availability in dynamic cloud environments.

Title: Accelerating Distributed Systems with gRPC: A High-Performance Framework for Modern Applications
Abstract: Unlock the power of gRPC to revolutionize distributed systems! Discover how its blazing-fast performance, Protobuf efficiency, and built-in streaming transform microservices, IoT, and real-time apps. Learn to integrate gRPC with Kubernetes and DevOps tools to build scalable, future-proof systems

Title: Distributed Caching & Queueing in the Cloud
Abstract: Learn how to supercharge your backend with distributed caching and queueing! Handle traffic spikes, slash latency, and scale gracefully in the cloud. Perfect for any developer seeking practical performance boosts—no microservices required.

Title: Mastering Event-Driven Architecture for Cloud-Native Scalability and Resilience
Abstract: Discover how Event-Driven Architecture (EDA) powers scalable, resilient cloud systems. Muhammad Rizwan shares insights on decoupling components, async communication, and tools like Azure Event Grid. Learn to optimize microservices and distributed systems for cloud-native environments.

Title: Unified Multi-Cloud Monitoring: Achieving Seamless Observability Across Cloud Providers
Abstract: Unlock unparalleled observability across cloud landscapes. Discover how unified monitoring integrates robust security, real-time analytics, and resilient architectures. Explore cutting-edge strategies to gain deep insights, proactively mitigate risks, and ensure high-performance cloud operations.

Title: Blind Spots: Strengthening System Observability
Abstract: Ever trusted your monitoring dashboard showing 'all green' minutes before a critical service outage? Despite comprehensive metrics, traces, and logs, critical failures still manage to slip through undetected. This talk uncovers persistent blind spots in modern observability practices.

Title: Resilience: Harnessing Chaos Engineering to Build Robust Systems
Abstract: Discover how chaos engineering revolutionizes system reliability by proactively testing failures in real-world conditions. Learn proven practices to build resilient, scalable systems, minimize downtime, and fortify your infrastructure against unexpected disruptions. Resilience starts with chaos!

Title: Building Observability into Cloud-Native Applications
Abstract: This session explores how to build observability into cloud-native applications, providing real-time insights that improve reliability, performance, and incident response in modern systems.

Title: Optimizing Cache Usage in Docker Builds
Abstract: Discover practical ways to speed up your Docker builds by optimizing cache usage. This talk covers simple techniques like organizing layers, using bind mounts, and working with cache mounts. Ideal for developers who want to save time and improve their build process.

Title: AI for Distributed Systems and Microservices
Abstract: This session explores how AI-driven strategies bolster cloud-native systems' resilience. Learn how I’ve integrated AI to optimize microservices, streamline Kubernetes adoption, and implement predictive monitoring for robust distributed systems and effective incident prevention.

Title: Cloud Compute Cost Showdown: How We Saved Millions Optimizing AWS EMR, Databricks workloads
Abstract: Cloud costs spiraling out of control. In this talk, we’ll break down how we saved millions optimizing AWS EMR and Databricks workloads without sacrificing performance. Learn realworld strategies, cost benchmarking insights, and best practices to maximize efficiency and slash cloud spend Dont miss it

Title: Optimizing Multi-Tenant SaaS: Scalable Architectures for Performance, Security, and Cost Efficiency
Abstract: Unlock the power of multi-tenancy! Learn how to cut cloud costs by 35%, boost performance 3x, and fortify security with AI-driven scaling, smart authentication, and cross-tenant isolation. Packed with real-world insights, this session is your blueprint for building high-performance SaaS at scale!

Title: Advancing Software Engineering: Performance Optimization, Quantum Computing, User-Centric Design, and DevOps Evolution
Abstract: Unlock the future of software engineering! Discover how Java optimization cuts runtime by 50%, quantum computing revolutionizes cryptography, AI-driven UX boosts engagement by 30%, and DevOps automation slashes deployment time by 70%.

Title: Transforming Borrower Engagement with a Mobile-First Loan Application Platform
Abstract: Discover how we transformed lending with a mobile-first borrower portal that slashed loan processing times by 30%, boosted customer satisfaction by 35%, and cut support calls by 40%. Learn actionable strategies to modernize platforms, optimize UX, and deliver superior digital experiences.

Title: Scaling Microservices in Cloud Environments
Abstract: Discover strategies for efficiently scaling microservices in cloud environments. Learn about load balancing, auto-scaling, and best practices for optimizing performance and cost.

Title: Focus on Core Value and Keep Cloud Infrastructure Flexible with Ports & Adapters
Abstract: Cloud infrastructure decisions, if uncontrolled, can easily limit future flexibility, making it harder to adapt to evolving cloud vendor offerings. This talk explores how systematically applying the 'Ports & Adapters' pattern helps teams keep options open and ensure system evolution as it scales.

Title: Scaling a Beast: Lessons from 400x Growth in a High-Stakes Financial System
Abstract: Scaling a financial system from 66m to 25b records is no easy feat. I’ll share the highs and lows of managing this 400x growth while keeping data accurate and real-time. No-BS strategies to tackle big challenges without becoming a database expert — perfect to scale and succeed.

Title: From RabbitMQ to SQS: Lessons Learned from a Serverless Migration
Abstract: Migrating from RabbitMQ to SQS? It’s more than just a queue swap! In this talk, I’ll share how I leveraged LLMs to automate and optimise the migration, tackling message ordering, retries, and scaling challenges. Learn key pitfalls, best practices to supercharge your serverless messaging!

Title: From Chaos to Clarity: Simplifying Cloud Management with a Personal Touch
Abstract: Tired of juggling complex cloud setups? Join me as I share my personal journey to simplify cloud management. Learn how I turned chaos into clarity, discovering a flexible, predictable, and scalable solution that allowed me to focus on building, not managing. Ready for stress-free cloud scaling?

Title: Container Escape Attacks: Detection and Mitigation in a Cloud-Native Context
Abstract: Containerization enhances application deployment but introduces security risks, notably container escape attacks. My talk will examine attack vectors such as runtime vulnerabilities, kernel exploits, and misconfigurations. It discusses real-world cases, detection methods, and mitigation strategies.

Title: Empowering Cloud Security: AI-Driven Multi-Layer Defense for Scalable and Proactive Threat Mitigation
Abstract: Discover how to revolutionize cloud security with a cutting-edge, AI-powered multi-layer defense framework. From zero-trust network segmentation to intelligent API protection, learn actionable strategies that deliver 60% better threat mitigation redefine resilience in the evolving cloud landscape.

Title: Delivering SaaS on-prem with Cloud-native tools
Abstract: As companies increasingly move to the cloud, they encounter common challenges such as security concerns, raising costs, and more. This presentation explores how to deliver a SaaS experience on-premises using cloud-native tools to build a fully managed service on customers' infrastructure.

Title: Blockchain-Powered Incident Management: Immutable Security in Cloud-Native Environments
Abstract: Transform security operations with blockchain-powered incident management! Learn how immutable audit trails, AI-driven threat detection (94% accuracy), and zero-trust security slash response times by 92% and cut costs by $1.2M/year.

Title: How to Secure Your Containers at Scale
Abstract: Join us to explore the future of application security in containerized environments! Discover building automated solutions to seamlessly remediate vulnerabilities in container images to elevate your Enterprise’s security posture. Don’t miss this essential talk!

Title: Scaling Real-Time ML Systems: Building a Cloud-Native Fraud Detection Platform Processing 1.5M TPS
Abstract: Dive into the architecture of a cloud-native ML platform that processes 1.5M transactions per second across 1000+ nodes. Learn how to build globally distributed ML inference systems with sub-millisecond latency, 99.99% uptime, and bulletproof security. Real infrastructure, real code, real results.

Title: Cloud-Native Threat Modeling: It Starts with a Conversation
Abstract: Security is part of your job—even without the title! But where to start? Threat modeling helps you spot risks before they become real issues. This talk reframes it as a conversation, not a checkbox. Learn key questions to ask, who to involve, and takeaways from the 2024 Envoy Gateway threat model

Title: The Secret to Handling Dynamic Secrets
Abstract: You want to rotate secrets used by applications every two weeks without manually restarting applications. In this session, discover the cloud-native secret to handling dynamic secrets that frequently rotate - automation! Learn about application-agnostic and -aware methods for secrets injection.

Title: AI-Powered Fraud Detection in Cloud-Native Financial Systems: Enhancing Security with Predictive and Behavioral Analytics
Abstract: cloud-native AI is revolutionizing fraud detection with 90% accuracy, reducing false positives, and cutting fraud losses by 40%. Discover real-time anomaly detection and scalable AI models used by top financial giants

Title: Innovative Approaches to Security: Micro-Segmentation's Impact on Cloud Environments
Abstract: Step into the future of cybersecurity with the talk on "Innovative Approaches to Security: Micro-Segmentation's Impact on Cloud Environments"! Discover how micro-segmentation revolutionizes cloud security. Don't miss out on unlocking the secrets to safeguarding the cloud infrastructure!

Title: Why VPNs Are Essential for Corporate Resource Security and How to Test Them: Key Tools, Tricks, and Best Practices
Abstract: Discover how to test the VPN connection, traffic inspection for malware protection, network and computer interruptions. Learn which network hardware configurations should be covered, which terminal commands and Bash scripts will help you along the way.

Title: AI-Powered Fraud Detection in Cloud-Native Digital Payments: Real-Time Security and Future Innovations
Abstract: AI is revolutionizing cloud-native digital payments! With fraud losses hitting $48B by 2025, can AI stop the surge? Discover real-time fraud detection, predictive analytics, and quantum-secure encryption—cut fraud by 40%, speed up transactions by 25%, and secure the future of fintech

Title: Unlocking Business Insights with OpenTelemetry: Beyond Logging for Cloud-Native Applications like Chef360™
Abstract: Logs and tracing are fine for debugging but fall short when trying to manage multiple customers operationally in software-as-a-service. We added OTEL to allow the business to price services on a consumption basis, show customers what they were using, and manage clusters for performance.

Title: Quarkus + Serverless: Making Java competitive in the cloud
Abstract: Because of the CPU and Memory resource consumption of the Java Virtual Machine or JVM, the Java language has lost competition in the cloud to languages like Javascript and Golang, but with Quarkus offering a solution to the resource consumption and startup times of software components.

Title: Containers and Kubernetes made easy with Podman Desktop
Abstract:
How can you ensure your cloud-native applications move seamlessly from your machine to a production environment? Let's look at Podman Desktop, an open-source tool for working with containers, Kubernetes, and even infusing generative AI into your existing apps!*

*This speaker has promised fun demos!

JobTitle1: Oracle DBA & Specialist for Cloud migrations
Title: Orchestrating the Future: Decentralized Automation & RESTful Integration with Dimensigon DM
Abstract: Dimensigon is an open‐source Python platform that decentralizes and orchestrates complex inter‐server automation. It integrates diverse IT infrastructures via RESTful APIs, enabling continuous automation, secure distributed management, and real‐time log federation—even across disconnected networks.

Title: Simplifying Kubernetes Connectivity With a Powerful CLI for SRE's
Abstract: Simplify Kubernetes connectivity with kconnect, a powerful tool that streamlines access to multiple clusters across env's. By automating context switching and credential management reduces complexity, enhances productivity, and empowers teams to navigate Kubernetes clusters seamlessly & securely.

Title: Automating IAM Deployments: Enhancing Security, Efficiency, and Scalability
Abstract: Struggling with complex, error-prone IAM deployments? Automate them! Learn how automation streamlines access control, boosts security, and slashes deployment time. From IaC to AI-driven governance, discover cutting-edge strategies to scale IAM efficiently and securely. Don’t miss this game-changer!

Title: Azure Landing Zone: Accelerating Your Cloud Transformation
Abstract: Azure Landing Zones provide a scalable foundation for cloud transformation, ensuring governance, security, and operational excellence. Aligned with the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework, provides seamless workload deployment, cost efficiency, and compliance, setting the stage for sustainable growth

Title: Cloud-Powered Retail: Serving Future Needs Today
Abstract: This talk shows how cloud-native technologies are transforming retail by driving agility, personalization, and real-time decision-making to meet evolving customer expectations and future needs.

Title: Empowering Cloud-Native Solutions with Software-Defined Networking for IoT and 5G
Abstract: Discover how Software-Defined Networking (SDN) revolutionizes IoT and 5G with unmatched agility, scalability, and intelligence. Learn how SDN powers real-time decisions, network slicing, and edge computing, unlocking the future of hyper-connected, cloud-native ecosystems.
